author: DamiLee
description:
This bathroom listens to you. Literally 

The Hi Toilet in Nanago Dori Park is the world’s most hygienic public restroom—completely voice-activated so you never have to touch a thing. It’s part of Tokyo’s 17-designer-bathroom glow-up, proving that even toilets can be architectural icons 

https://youtu.be/EGpXZL5y2Cc?si=DuPOZHOHfHQM7TWw
title: "Hi Toilet"
